name: FreeDOS
summary: Complete, free, MS-DOS compatible operating system with no enhancements or advanced features.

name: openSUSE Leap 42.3
description: openSUSELeap is build with all the Long-Term Support Packages from community and upstream projects.

name: openSUSE Kubic
summary: Get the Container Host OS for your applications and services.
description: “Take the risk out of updating and keeping your Container Host OS secure with transactional updates that always keep your containers secure.”

name: Tumbleweed
summary: Stay update to date with upstream development with a well tested, proven rolling release. Get openSUSE Tumbleweed.
